A Sudanese court has sentenced a woman to hang for apostasy after she left Islam and married a Christian man. She is said to be eight months pregnant!

The following countries, amongst others, have outlawed Apostasy, meaning leaving religion.

•	Afghanistan – death penalty, although the U.S. and other coalition members have put pressure that has prevented recent executions!
•	Iran – death penalty
•	Kuwait
•	Malaysia – illegal in five of 13 states (fine, imprisonment, and flogging)
•	Mauritania – death penalty if still apostate after 3 days
•	Morocco – illegal to proselytize conversion (15 years' imprisonment)
•	Pakistan – death penalty since 2007
•	Qatar – death penalty
•	Saudi Arabia – death penalty
•	Somalia – death penalty
•	Sudan – death penalty
•	United Arab Emirates – 3 years' imprisonment, flogging
•	Yemen – death penalty

UK citizens and Government to place the spotlight on these countries and put pressure on them to change these monstrous laws.
